# Dependency Review Configuration
# This file controls the severity levels for dependency scanning

# Policy source: where to read policy files from
# Options: local, github
# - local: read from .github/policies/ in current repository
# - github: read from remote GitHub repository (POLICY_REPO)
policy_source: github

# GitHub policy repository (only used when policy_source=github)
# Format: owner/repo
policy_repo: gh-action-pr-demo/config
policy_ref: main
policy_path: .github/policies

# Minimum severity level for dependency-review-action to fail the build
# Options: critical, high, moderate, low
fail_on_severity: high

# Minimum severity level for policy violations to be reported
# Options: critical, high, moderate, low
min_severity: high
